name: Unidentified_Quarren_patron
content:
A Quarren male patron visited the Outer Rim planet Batuu by the time of the war between the First Order and the Resistance. Around 34 ABY, he visited Batuu's Black Spire Outpost and saw the smuggler Izal Garsea's ship, the Meridian, parked at the repair station operated by the mechanic Salju. The patron then decided to ride to the nearby Oga's Cantina establishment, ordering himself a beer.
As he finished his beverage in the cantina, he, the farmer Julen Rakab, and the father of the Nautolan Ksana discussed whether Garsea had departed the planet yet. The patron insisted that Garsea must still be on Batuu because he had seen her ship just prior, remarking that he wanted to buy her a drink to thank her for her work in arresting the crew of the smuggler Ana Tolla.
The Quarren patron appeared in A Crash of Fate, a 2019 young-adult novel written by Zoraida CÃ³rdova.
